data.title: Ohio University
data.meta_description: McGuffey Hall was built in 1839 and housed students in the early 1900's, then student organizations, and finally administrative offices.The Ohio University Trustees' meeting room and office were also in the building until they moved to Walter Hall in 2004.William Holmes McGuffey
data.text:
McGuffey Hall was built in 1839 and housed students in the early 1900's, then student organizations, and finally administrative offices.

The Ohio University Trustees' meeting room and office were also in the building until they moved to Walter Hall in 2004.

William Holmes McGuffey
